leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 气候-数值模式与数据同化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 模式→同化→评估→后处理→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模式组件 + 同化库 + 评测

queries: [WEB] DART data assimilation research testbed github
[WEB] PDAF parallel data assimilation framework github

tools.name: DataAssim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble Kalman Filter data assimilation library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing various ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) methods for data assimilation, designed for high-performance scientific computing and integration with dynamic models.

tools.name: Saber
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for information extraction in biomedical text
tools.detailed_description: Saber (Sequence Annotator for Biomedical Entities and Relations) is a deep-learning based tool for information extraction in the biomedical domain, facilitating the identification of entities and relations in scientific literature.

tools.name: CARDAMOM
tools.one_line_profile: Carbon Data Model Framework for assimilating earth observations
tools.detailed_description: The CARDAMOM (CARbon DAta MOdel fraMework) framework is designed to retrieve terrestrial carbon cycle states and parameters by assimilating diverse Earth observation datasets into a process-based model.

tools.name: 4dvarnet-core
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for 4DVar data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: Core implementation of the 4DVarNet architecture, which combines variational data assimilation (4DVar) principles with deep learning to solve inverse problems in geosciences, particularly for ocean dynamics reconstruction.

tools.name: ClimaAtmos.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Atmosphere model leveraging data assimilation and machine learning
tools.detailed_description: ClimaAtmos.jl is a component of the CliMA ecosystem, providing an atmospheric model designed to integrate data assimilation and machine learning for calibrating subgrid-scale processes and improving climate predictions.

tools.name: DassFlow-1D
tools.one_line_profile: Data assimilation software for 1D free surface flows
tools.detailed_description: DassFlow-1D is a software for variational data assimilation (4D-Var) in river hydraulics, solving 1D Shallow-Water equations (Saint-Venant equations) to model river network dynamics.

tools.name: DassFlow-2D
tools.one_line_profile: Data assimilation software for 2D free surface flows
tools.detailed_description: DassFlow-2D implements variational data assimilation for 2D Shallow-Water equations, suitable for modeling river networks and floodplains with complex topography.

tools.name: OpenDataCapture
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic data capture platform for clinical research instruments
tools.detailed_description: An electronic data capture platform designed for administering remote and in-person clinical instruments, facilitating data collection for neuroscience and medical research.

tools.name: netcdf2littler
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from NetCDF to Little-R format for WRF data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: An application to convert NetCDF files to the Little-R format, which is the accepted input format for the WRF data assimilation system (WRFDA) preprocessor (obsproc).

tools.name: swell
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow system for coupled data assimilation applications
tools.detailed_description: A workflow system designed for coupled data assimilation applications, developed by GEOS-ESM (Goddard Earth Observing System - Earth System Model).

tools.name: PyFenicsAD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic differentiation of FEniCS and Firedrake models in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling automatic differentiation of FEniCS and Firedrake models within the Julia programming environment, facilitating scientific modeling and optimization.

tools.name: DASH
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB package for paleoclimate data assimilation workflow
tools.detailed_description: A package designed for paleoclimate data assimilation workflows, facilitating the reconstruction of past climates using proxy data and model simulations.

tools.name: CONES
tools.one_line_profile: Coupler for OpenFOAM and Data Assimilation libraries
tools.detailed_description: A coupling tool that connects the CFD software OpenFOAM with external codes, specifically designed to perform sequential Data Assimilation techniques like the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) using the CWIPI coupler.

tools.name: DART
tools.one_line_profile: Data Assimilation Research Testbed
tools.detailed_description: A community facility for ensemble data assimilation developed at NCAR. It provides a modular framework to couple various scientific models with observations for data assimilation research and operations.

tools.name: HRLDAS
tools.one_line_profile: High Resolution Land Data Assimilation System
tools.detailed_description: A land data assimilation system that drives land surface models (like Noah-MP) with observed forcing data to simulate land surface states and fluxes.

tools.name: HRLDAS-release
tools.one_line_profile: Release version of HRLDAS with Noah-MP
tools.detailed_description: The release repository for the High Resolution Land Data Assimilation System (HRLDAS), containing the Noah-MP Land Surface Model for simulating soil moisture, temperature, and energy fluxes.

tools.name: pyDARTdiags
tools.one_line_profile: Python diagnostics for DART
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing and visualizing observation space diagnostics generated by the Data Assimilation Research Testbed (DART).

tools.name: GDASApp
tools.one_line_profile: Global Data Assimilation System Application
tools.detailed_description: The application layer for NOAA's Global Data Assimilation System (GDAS), managing the execution and configuration of data assimilation workflows.

tools.name: GSI
tools.one_line_profile: Gridpoint Statistical Interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A data assimilation system used by NOAA for operational weather forecasting. It performs 3D-Var, 4D-Var, and hybrid EnVar analysis to combine observations with model background fields.

tools.name: global-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: NOAA Global Workflow
tools.detailed_description: The superstructure and workflow management system supporting NOAA's Global Forecast System (GFS), Global Ensemble Forecast System (GEFS), and Seasonal Forecast Systems (SFS).

tools.name: NSRDB
tools.one_line_profile: National Solar Radiation Database pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The data processing pipeline for the National Solar Radiation Database. It includes modules for satellite data assimilation, cloud property prediction, radiative transport modeling, and data gap-filling.

tools.name: 4DEnVar
tools.one_line_profile: 4DEnVar Data Assimilation implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the 4D Ensemble Variational (4DEnVar) data assimilation method, providing a codebase for testing and understanding this hybrid assimilation technique.

tools.name: AGILE
tools.one_line_profile: Open Global Glacier Data Assimilation Framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for assimilating data into global glacier models to improve estimates of glacier mass balance and evolution.

tools.name: OpenDA
tools.one_line_profile: Open Data Assimilation Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolbox for data assimilation and calibration. It provides a set of interfaces and algorithms to easily connect numerical models with observations for state estimation and parameter optimization.

tools.name: FNP
tools.one_line_profile: Fourier Neural Processes for Data Assimilation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Fourier Neural Processes (FNP) for arbitrary-resolution data assimilation, as presented at NeurIPS 2024. It applies deep learning techniques to the data assimilation problem.

tools.name: FengWu-4DVar
tools.one_line_profile: AI Weather Model with 4DVar Assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A system integrating the FengWu large weather model with 4D-Var data assimilation techniques to improve weather forecasting accuracy using AI methods.

tools.name: PDAF
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Data Assimilation Framework
tools.detailed_description: A software framework for ensemble data assimilation. It provides fully implemented data assimilation algorithms (like EnKF, LETKF, LSEIK) and is designed for high-performance computing environments.

tools.name: fmr-enkf
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Multipole Method EnKF
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Ensemble Kalman Filters (EnKFs) accelerated by the Fast Multipole Method (FMM) and Randomized Low-Rank Approximations (RandLRA) for efficient data assimilation.

tools.name: PET
tools.one_line_profile: Python Ensemble Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for data assimilation and parameter estimation, providing implementations of various ensemble-based algorithms.

tools.name: DataAssimBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking tools for applying AI/ML to data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to evaluate and compare Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning methods applied to Data Assimilation tasks, facilitating the development of data-driven DA algorithms.

tools.name: vortexwake
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Vortex Wake Modelling solver with Discrete Adjoint
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based solver for Free-Vortex Wake Modelling, featuring Discrete Adjoint capabilities for aerodynamic analysis and optimization, developed by TU Delft Data Driven Control.

tools.name: dust
tools.one_line_profile: Data Assimilation framework for Agent-Based Models
tools.detailed_description: A research tool for performing Data Assimilation on Agent-Based Models (ABMs), developed to support urban analytics and dynamic modeling research.

tools.name: DIFFICE_jax
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable neural-network solver for ice shelf data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based differentiable neural-network solver designed for data assimilation tasks specifically in the context of ice shelf dynamics and glaciology.

tools.name: torchda
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning library for Data Assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library leveraging PyTorch to integrate Deep Learning techniques into Data Assimilation workflows, enabling hybrid modeling and state estimation.

tools.name: ODIL
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for solving inverse and data assimilation problems using discrete loss optimization
tools.detailed_description: ODIL (Optimizing a Discrete Loss) is a Python framework designed to solve inverse problems and data assimilation tasks involving partial differential equations (PDEs). It employs a discretization-based approach to optimize loss functions, facilitating the integration of observational data with physical models.

tools.name: DASPy
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Land Data Assimilation System for CLM
tools.detailed_description: DASPy is a Python-based multivariate Land Data Assimilation System (LDAS) designed for the Community Land Model (CLM). It incorporates high-performance computing capabilities to facilitate the assimilation of various land surface observations into the CLM 4.5 model.

tools.name: PyPanda
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of PANDA for gene regulatory network reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: PyPanda is a Python implementation of the PANDA (Passing Attributes between Networks for Data Assimilation) algorithm. It is used in bioinformatics to reconstruct gene regulatory networks by integrating multiple sources of data through a message-passing approach.

tools.name: optimizer
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for optimization and data assimilation algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A collection of algorithms implemented in MATLAB for scientific modeling and parameter estimation, including MCMC, Differential Evolution Markov Chain, and Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF).

tools.name: scale-letkf
tools.one_line_profile: LETKF data assimilation package for SCALE-RM weather model
tools.detailed_description: The Local Ensemble Transform Kalman Filter (LETKF) data assimilation implementation specifically designed for the SCALE-RM (Scalable Computing for Advanced Library and Environment - Regional Model) weather model.

tools.name: eoldas
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Observation Land Data Assimilation System
tools.detailed_description: A framework for assimilating Earth Observation (EO) data into land surface models. It allows for the retrieval of biophysical parameters and state estimation using variational methods.

tools.name: L96-EnKF
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble Kalman Filter implementation for Lorenz 96 model
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) applied to the Lorenz 96 atmospheric toy model, serving as a benchmark tool for data assimilation algorithm development.

tools.name: pyWRFDART
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for coupling WRF and DART systems
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and utilities designed to facilitate the workflow and coupling between the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model and the Data Assimilation Research Testbed (DART).

tools.name: ADAF
tools.one_line_profile: AI Data Assimilation Framework for Weather Forecasting
tools.detailed_description: An Artificial Intelligence Data Assimilation Framework developed by Microsoft Research, designed to integrate deep learning with traditional data assimilation methods for weather forecasting applications.

tools.name: Appa
tools.one_line_profile: Latent Diffusion Models for Global Data Assimilation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a data assimilation method using Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs) to model and correct weather dynamics, supporting global weather forecasting tasks.

tools.name: DAPPER
tools.one_line_profile: Data Assimilation with Python: a Package for Experimental Research
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for benchmarking and experimental research in data assimilation (DA), providing implementations of various DA methods (EnKF, Particle Filters, etc.) and dynamical models.

tools.name: NEDAS
tools.one_line_profile: NERSC Ensemble Data Assimilation System
tools.detailed_description: An ensemble data assimilation system developed at NERSC, designed for assimilating data into numerical models, likely focusing on oceanographic or climatic applications.

tools.name: openDAQ
tools.one_line_profile: Open source data acquisition SDK
tools.detailed_description: A data acquisition (DAQ) SDK that provides a standard way to connect to sensors and measuring devices, facilitating scientific data generation and collection.

tools.name: OpenDataVal
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Benchmark for Data Valuation in Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and benchmark for data valuation algorithms, used in machine learning research to assess the contribution of data points to model performance.

tools.name: wrfxpy
tools.one_line_profile: WRF-SFIRE data acquisition, forecasting, and assimilation tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for managing WRF-SFIRE simulations, including data acquisition, forecasting, data assimilation, and visualization for wildfire and weather modeling.

tools.name: GSI (Graph)
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-friendly Subgraph Isomorphism solver
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a GPU-friendly algorithm for the Subgraph Isomorphism problem, a fundamental computational problem in graph theory with applications in bioinformatics and chemistry.

tools.name: KF-EBT
tools.one_line_profile: Kalman Filter Ensemble-Based Tracker
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of an object tracker using Kalman Filter and Ensemble-based methods, applicable in computer vision and signal processing research.

tools.name: AnDA
tools.one_line_profile: Analog Data Assimilation Library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Analog Data Assimilation, providing methods to combine data with analog forecasting models.

tools.name: LaVEnDAR
tools.one_line_profile: Land Variational Ensemble Data Assimilation Framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework implementing Four-Dimensional Ensemble Variational (4D-EnVar) data assimilation specifically for land surface models.

tools.name: EnKF-C
tools.one_line_profile: C implementation of Ensemble Kalman Filter for data assimilation with large-scale geophysical models
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, portable C framework for ensemble data assimilation (EnKF) designed to work with large-scale layered geophysical models (oceanography/atmospheric). It provides a flexible interface for coupling with various numerical models.

tools.name: LETKF (Miyoshi)
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the Local Ensemble Transform Kalman Filter
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran implementation of the Local Ensemble Transform Kalman Filter (LETKF) for data assimilation, originally developed by Takemasa Miyoshi.

tools.name: thiery-lab/data-assimilation
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementations of various data assimilation methods
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python codes implementing standard data assimilation algorithms, likely for educational or research prototyping purposes within the Thiery Lab.

tools.name: torch-assimilate
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch and Dask based library for efficient data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package leveraging PyTorch for gradients and Dask for parallelism to perform efficient data assimilation of weather model data and observations, specifically targeting GPU acceleration.

tools.name: Tandem
tools.one_line_profile: Tsunami Adjoint simulator for dispersive wave equations
tools.detailed_description: A scientific simulator for Tsunami Adjoint simulations focusing on Nonpoint sources and Dispersive wave equations on a self-gravitating Earth Model.

tools.name: UMD-LETKF
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Multi-Domain Local Ensemble Transform Kalman Filter
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran implementation of the Local Ensemble Transform Kalman Filter (LETKF) developed at the University of Maryland, designed for data assimilation across multiple domains.

tools.name: Darts
tools.one_line_profile: Library for time series forecasting and anomaly detection
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for user-friendly forecasting and anomaly detection on time series, widely used in scientific data analysis contexts such as weather and physics.

tools.name: viluiz/gan
tools.one_line_profile: GANs for Reduced-Order Models and Data Assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A framework applying Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) within a reduced-order model (ROM) context for time series prediction, data assimilation, and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: wme7/DataAssimilation
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab scripts for ENKF and IENKF data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Matlab scripts implementing Ensemble Kalman Filter (ENKF) and Iterative ENKF (IENKF) algorithms, serving as tools for developing data assimilation workflows.

tools.name: 4DVarFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Variational-constrained neural network for weather forecasting initialization
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of '4DVarFormer', a deep learning model for accurate initial field estimation in weather forecasting, combining variational constraints with neural networks.

tools.name: ICE
tools.one_line_profile: Incremental Covariance Estimation for Robust Localization
tools.detailed_description: Software for Incremental Covariance Estimation, a technique relevant to Kalman filtering and state estimation in navigation and potentially adaptable to other data assimilation contexts.

tools.name: DAFI
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble based data assimilation and field inversion framework
tools.detailed_description: DAFI is a C++ framework for ensemble-based data assimilation and field inversion, designed for high-performance computing applications in physics and engineering.

tools.name: AI-VarDA
tools.one_line_profile: Modular AI-based variational data assimilation framework
tools.detailed_description: A modular framework supporting traditional and AI-based variational algorithms (like FengWu-4DVar, VAE-Var) for data assimilation, featuring pluggable interfaces for forecast models.

tools.name: FuXi-DA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning data assimilation framework for satellite observations
tools.detailed_description: A generalized deep learning data assimilation framework specifically designed for assimilating satellite observations into weather models (FuXi).

tools.name: pp-EnKF
tools.one_line_profile: Performance portable Ensemble Kalman Filter
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance computing implementation of the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) using C++ std::execution for performance portability across architectures.

tools.name: torchEnKF
tools.one_line_profile: Auto differentiable Ensemble Kalman Filters
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Auto-differentiable Ensemble Kalman Filters, allowing for gradient-based optimization within the data assimilation process, based on PyTorch.

tools.name: pyPDAF
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to the Parallel Data Assimilation Framework (PDAF)
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper/interface for PDAF (Parallel Data Assimilation Framework), enabling the use of high-performance DA algorithms from Python.

tools.name: APSIM-EnKF
tools.one_line_profile: EnKF data assimilation framework for APSIM model
tools.detailed_description: An Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) framework specifically designed for assimilating data into the Agricultural Production Systems sIMulator (APSIM) model.

tools.name: Valiant
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble Kalman filter and ensemble optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A C library and executable for Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) and ensemble optimization, suitable for integrating with various numerical models.

tools.name: TensorVar
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient four-dimensional variational data assimilation framework
tools.detailed_description: TensorVar is a research tool designed for efficient four-dimensional variational (4D-Var) data assimilation. It likely leverages tensor computation frameworks to accelerate the optimization process involved in assimilating observational data into numerical models, suitable for atmospheric and oceanic science applications.
